title: Programming Practical Competency Enhancement: Evidence-Based Instructional Design Competency Development for Prospective Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Preservice science teachers can write three or more evidence collection and analysis activity designs for science classes by the end of a six-month course and demonstrate competence by scoring 4 or higher (out of 5) in each category of a peer evaluation rubric (clarity, scientific accuracy, feasibility, creativity).
Preservice science teachers develop at least three instructional strategies that foster argumentative discussions among students.
Preservice science teachers revise and refine their lesson designs at least twice based on peer feedback.
Preservice science teachers conduct peer evaluations by applying evidence-based lesson design rubrics.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
